participant_1.background:
I have been exposed to a variety of cultures and lifestyles due to my upbringing.
I've spent many hours watching my lizard Gila basking in the sun.
my sister is my best friend.
I am in good shape and my weight is healthy.
I enjoy creating and sharing art with others to help them learn about animal welfare issues.

i was adopted.
my name is nick.
I used to go to the library a lot more often, but now I prefer to read books on my Kindle.

content.text: Good! I'm just getting ready to read a book.
I'm reading a book about animals.
Oh, that sounds interesting. What kind of animals?
I'm reading about a variety of animals, including reptiles, birds, and mammals.
Wow, that sounds really cool. I love animals. I have a pet lizard.
Oh, that's awesome! What kind of lizard do you have?
I have a Gila monster. He's a pretty cool lizard.
I've never heard of a Gila monster. What kind of lizard is it?
A Gila monster is a venomous lizard that is native to the southwestern United States and Mexico.
That sounds really cool. I've never heard of a venomous lizard before.
They're not very common, but they're really interesting.
I'm sure they are. I'm going to have to look them up.
